desc: In-stock or custom flexible gooseneck tube positioning arms. Our SnakeClamp line of products is a flexible stand, mount or holder for iPads, tablets, ereaders, cameras, webcams, magnifiers, microphones, mirrors, smartphones and signs. We also offer many workholding clamps, machine guards and task lighting.

layout.text:
Flexible Gooseneck Tubing
To Hold What You Need,
Right Where You Need It

You don't have a third hand.  Neither do we.
That's why we created The SnakeClamp.
